426 
 
  
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
TASUED        
(with options in:  
Agricultural Economics, Agricultural  
Extension AND Rural Development, 
Agricultural Production AND Renewable 
Resources.  
  
  
  
AGRICULTURAL TECHNOLOGY AND  
EDUCATION 
MAUTY  
      
  
     
UTME  
(i) EKSU and CALABAR accept 'O' level pass in Chemistry.  
(ii) RSUST accepts two (2) 'O' level passes in English 
Language and Mathematics.  
(iii) RSUST accepts 'O' level pass in English Language 
provided candidates have distinction in 'O' level 
Agricultural Science.  
(iv) MAKURDI requires 'O' level credit passes in Agricultural 
Science and either Biology or Physics.  
(v) IMSU accepts D7 in English Language and 'O' level 
credit pass in Chemistry.  
(vi) DELSU accepts 'O' level pass in English Language.  
(vii) BOWEN and BENIN require five (5 ) 'O’ level credit 
passes including English Language,Mathematics, 
Chemistry and Biology/Agricultural Science.  
(viii) MAKURDI and MAIDUGURI requirefive (5) 'O' level 
credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, 
Physics, Chemistry and Biology or Agricultural Science.  
(ix) TASUED requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes at one 
sitting or six (6) 'O' level credit passes at two (2) sittings 
to include English Language, Biology/Agricultural 
Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and any one (1) or 
two (2) of Geography/Physics, Physics and Economics.  
(x) EDOMOK and UNNrequire 'O' level credit passes in 
Agricultural Science or Biology plus 'O' level pass in 
Chemistry in addition to UNN requirements.  
(xi) UYO requires 'O' level credit pass in English Language.  
(xii) ABSU requires five (5) 'O ' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Agricultural Science, Biology 
and any other subject.  
(xiii) UMUDIKE requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes atnot 
more than two (2) sittings to include  English Language, 
Mathematics, Biology or Agric. Science, Chemistry and 
any other relevant subject.  
(xiv) NDU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in English  
Language, Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural and any
